subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Women's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: The United States women’s national team will play its final match before departing for Europe and the World Cup against Mexico at Red Bulls Arena in Harrison, N.J., on June 5.
snippet: The United States women’s national team will play its final match before departing for Europe and the World Cup against Mexico at Red Bulls Arena in Harrison, N.J., on June 5.
